name: Flipa Coin
description:
Play as Flipa the Coin. Press Z to flip. Avoid expenses and save money!

Press Escape to restart the game. Press R to restart the current level.

---
The game only have 4 really basic levels. In the upcoming We'll update the game with more content, music and mechanics.


Credits:

  • @Necromic Graphics, design & code.
  • @Olimobu Audio & Sfx.
